title: Add Two Numbers
description: Add two values and display the result.
code:
let a be 7
let b be 3
say a + b

title: Square Root
description: Calculate square root of a number.
code:
let number be 16
let root be number ^ 0.5
say root

title: Area of Triangle
description: Compute the area of a triangle using Heron's formula.
code:
let a be 5
let b be 6
let c be 7
let s be (a + b + c) / 2
let area be (s * (s - a) * (s - b) * (s - c)) ^ 0.5
say area

title: Leap Year Check
description: Check if a year is a leap year.

title: Odd or Even
description: Check if a number is odd or even.

title: Factorial (Loop)
code:
let n be 5
let fact be 1
repeat i from 1 to n:
  fact be fact * i
end
say fact

title: Fibonacci Sequence
code:
let a be 0
let b be 1
say a
say b
repeat i from 1 to 3:
  let temp be a + b
  say temp
  a be b
  b be temp
end

title: Simple Calculator
code:
let x be 10
let y be 5
say x + y
say x - y
say x * y
say x / y

title: Power of Number
description: Calculate x raised to power y.
code:
let x be 2
let y be 3
say x ^ y
